Announcing Version 2.0

Jul 11, 2015
1 minute read

In an effort to make Pixyll easier to customize and more aesthetically pleasing, weâ€™ve release version 2.0.

Pixyll now features:

  • Line anchors in code blocks and new syntax highlighting
  • A customizable variables file
  • Modular, and lighter weight CSS
  • No more max-width media queries
Share this post!

Pixyll is an open-source Jekyll theme that's built by John Otander. When he's not writing code and building things, he likes to ski. A. Lot.

Follow him on Twitter.
